channel.title: Need help with a small method
channel.description:
Alright i need a method using keys. so basiclly heres what happens.
an npc i coded when killed will drop item 85 " shiny key " this key needs to be used to unlock this door " 14749 "
i need the door " 14749 " to be locked untill the key is used on it. When the key is used on it. it removes the key. and teleports the player inside.
I know this is a few simple codes. but i have no idea what i would need to do. some help ?
my base is 317 [pi]
i coded this im not sure if it will work tho.
[sup]case 14749: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(85,1) c.getPA().movePlayer(3448, 3517, 0); c.sendMessage("Door-1 Unlocked"); c.getItems().deleteItem2(85,1); break;[/sup]

item.title: Need help with a small method
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

it worked because of your code dragon. thank you

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Means you don’t have item 85 or if you do I’m not sure what the Boolean is please post the Boolean so I can read it. I don’t code PI.

playerHasItem(int, int); is the one I’m looking for.

item.title: Need help with a small method
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

i meant 14749 yes

the only error i get is to add another ) after the first statement
case 14749:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(85,1) <-------

so when i add it and go in game when i click the door nothing happens. the item isnt removed nor am i moved.

ahh nvm the else if statement worked.

thank you so much. if i could rep you i would.

Read full topic

     c.sendMessage("you don't have the required key");
}

item.title: Need help with a small method
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Instead of
case 14749: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(85,1) c.getPA().movePlayer(3448, 3517, 0); c.sendMessage("Door-1 Unlocked"); c.getItems().deleteItem2(85,1); break;

Try getting your spacing right.
The. Adding your bracket.

[code]

case 14749:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(85,1) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3448, 3517, 0);
c.sendMessage(“Door-1 Unlocked”);
c.getItems().deleteItem2(85,1);
}
break;
[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a small method

item.title: Need help with a small method
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

Alright i need a method using keys. so basiclly heres what happens.

an npc i coded when killed will drop item 85 " shiny key "
this key needs to be used to unlock this door " 14749 "

i need the door " 14749 " to be locked untill the key is used on it.
When the key is used on it. it removes the key. and teleports the player inside.

I know this is a few simple codes. but i have no idea what i would need to do. some help ?

my base is 317 [pi]

i coded this im not sure if it will work tho.

	[sup]case 14749:
	if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(85,1)
	c.getPA().movePlayer(3448, 3517, 0);
	c.sendMessage("Door-1 Unlocked");
   		c.getItems().deleteItem2(85,1);
	break;[/sup]
